sentences.en: a lotion to normalize oily skin
sentences.cn: 使油性皮肤恢复正常的护肤液

sentences.en: A pall of oily black smoke drifted over the cliff-top.
sentences.cn: 一团油腻的黑色烟雾飘到悬崖顶上。

sentences.en: As with all oily hair treatments, shampoo needs to be applied first.
sentences.cn: 跟所有油性头发的护理一样，必须要先用洗发露。

sentences.en: Butter, margarine, and oily fish are all good sources of vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 黄油、人造黄油和多脂鱼都含有丰富的维生素D。

sentences.en: Cream cleansers are totally off limits for oily skin.
sentences.cn: 油性皮肤不能使用洁面霜。

sentences.en: He always wears the oily old pair of jeans.
sentences.cn: 他总是穿着那条沾满油污的旧牛仔裤.

sentences.en: He had behaved with undue and oily familiarity.
sentences.cn: 他表现得过于亲热，媚态毕现。

sentences.en: He was wiping his hands on an oily rag.
sentences.cn: 他正在用一块满是油污的破布擦手。

sentences.en: He wiped his hands on an oily rag.
sentences.cn: 他在一块油腻的抹布上擦了擦手。

sentences.en: I don't like oily shop assistants.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢过分殷勤的店员.

sentences.en: Milk, oily fish and egg all contain vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 牛奶、油性鱼类和鸡蛋都含有维生素D.

sentences.en: Paul found the sauce too oily.
sentences.cn: 保罗觉得这种酱太油腻了。

sentences.en: The older man asked in his oily voice what he could do for them today.
sentences.cn: 年长的那个男人声音谄媚地询问今天能为他们做些什么。

sentences.en: There's a lot of evidence that oily fish, as distinct from fatty meat, has a beneficial effect.
sentences.cn: 有许多证据表明油性鱼，与高脂肪肉不同，对人体有益。

sentences.en: When she was younger, she had very oily skin.
sentences.cn: 她年轻的时候是油性皮肤。

words.tran_cn: 涂油的；用油防水的；喝醉的
光滑地；油似地；马屁十足地；圆滑地
[油脂]油的；油质的；油滑的；油腔滑调的

trans.tran_cn: 油的，油质的，含油的，油多的，油腻的，油滑的，会奉承的
